welcome_message_body: Welcome to Banjarmasin, the city of a thousand rivers and known for its vibrant floating markets and cultural diversity. We hope you enjoy your time exploring our charming city and all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Coffee Toffee Taher Square
restaurants.description: Coffee Toffee Taher Square is a café located in Banjarmasin.
restaurants.address: Jl. Kapten Piere Tendean No. 25, Banjarmasin, Kalimantan Selatan

restaurants.name: Warung Pakmin (Bambu Kuning)
restaurants.description: Warung Pakmin (Bambu Kuning) is a noodle restaurant located in Banjarmasin.

restaurants.name: KFC
restaurants.description: KFC is a fast food restaurant located in Banjarmasin.
restaurants.address: Duta Mall, Lantai 1 (Jalan Ahmad Yani KM 2), Banjarmasin, South Borneo 70234

restaurants.name: Ayam Bakar Wong Solo
restaurants.description: Ayam Bakar Wong Solo is a fast food restaurant located in Banjarmasin.
restaurants.address: Jl. Haryono MT (Belakang Mesjid Sabilal), Banjarmasin, Kalimantan Selatan

restaurants.name: De 'Waroeng Family Resto & Cafe
restaurants.description: De 'Waroeng Family Resto & Cafe is a indonesian restaurant located in Banjarmasin.
restaurants.address: Jalan Achmad Yani Km. 2, Banjarmasin, Kalimantan Selatan

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
